To solve this task, I need to first get my current balance using `get_balance` function and then use `get_most_recent_transactions` function to find out how much I paid for Spotify in March. After that, I will calculate 10% of the original payment and send the difference to Spotify.

I have retrieved my current balance and transaction history. I found that I paid 50.0 for Spotify Premium on March 1st. To calculate the difference due to the 10% price increase, I need to find 10% of 50.0 and send it to Spotify.
